title: Freshman Phenom
description: Amazon Kindle description: Will Stover is thrust into the spotlight before he is ready. Still too young to drive, the 14-year-old is called upon to lead his high school football team into a new season. Facing resentment from teammates both old and new, Will must find his way in the midst of the confusing world of ninth grade. Follow Will and his athletic adventures in the first book of this captivating sports series.
author: C.E.  Butler
